Description_lang: Sacrifice part of your mortal essence, dealing $m3% of your maximum health in Shadow damage to yourself.In exchange you become Shath'Yar, breaking your normal faction allegiance, serving only N'Zoth.N'lyeth can only be used outdoors in Kul Tiras, Zandalar and during Visions of N'Zoth while in War Mode.
AuraDescription_lang: Faction changed to Shath'Yar.Hostile to your normal faction.Dying will cause you to lose this effect.
